entry.title: WIND WARNING , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:39 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 02:30 AM NDT Monday 20 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -4.0°C
Wind: SW 27 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle early this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast in the evening and after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing. Windy. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
